MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH12 postcode area of Edinburgh. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have managed to restore power to some customers and identified an underground cable fault affecting the rest of our customers. We have arranged additional resources to attend to assist in carrying out the repair and now expect your supply to be restored by 2:00am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:15pm on Saturday 17th April 2021
